name: Rotary International - Digital Transformation and Modernization
description: Comprehensive digital transformation including SharePoint migration, microservices architecture implementation, and Salesforce-based lead management system optimization for the global service organization serving millions of members.
challenge: SharePoint 2007 facing end-of-support risks, scattered reporting systems, inefficient data synchronization between CRM and Integration Services leading to membership churn. Rotary receives 30,000 leads annually but converts less than 10% to membership.
solution: Migrated from SharePoint 2007 to modern platform, compressed 36-week timeline to 14 weeks. Implemented microservices with Domain Driven Design and Event Driven Architecture. Enhanced lead conversion through data-driven personalization and distributed marketing setup with Salesforce optimization.
outcomes: $100,000 additional value gain for SharePoint migration
$2 Million+ additional value gain from microservices implementation
$0.36 Million+ projected contract value for lead transformation
Improved data integrity across Rotary Products ecosystem
